text: Lynn Borden (March 24, 1937 - March 3, 2015) was an American actress. She was best known for her role as "Barbara Baxter" in the final season of the Shirley Booth sitcom Hazel, which aired on CBS from 1965 to 1966 though the program began in 1961 on NBC. Borden was born in Detroit. She died of an illness in Encino, Los Angeles. title: Lynn Borden
